segments.text: I notice the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is about to tip over, and he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is completely clueless about what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she’s just drying dishes like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks while everything is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t see how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl realizes the danger or if she’s just excited about the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is going to end badly if no one stops them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and soon the whole floor will be soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR
